b: ^( I don't... really want to talk to Lyra right now. Maybe someone else knows about rogue Witnesses? )
^( I guess there's always the ^CYArkives^CX up past town... but Ophiuchus will
^ be there. Is it worth it? )
^What brings you to the library? I thought you were busy getting ready for your expedition.
^( I don't... really want to talk to Lyra right now. Maybe someone else knows about rogue Witnesses? )
^( I guess there's always the ^CYArkives^CX up past town... but Ophiuchus will
^ be there. Is it worth it? )
^Can I do anything else for you?

c-0: ^Well, it's nice to see you. Good luck today!
c-1: ^What do you mean? You live here.
^No, like - I've gone back in time.
^Oh... I see. How long has this been happening?

b: ^This is the first time I've been sent back.
^Hmm. Well, we had better make sure this is a real loop. Let me know next time you come back.
^Right. I guess it could have been a weird dream.
^Twice now. Each time seems to be around ten minutes.
^Interesting. What happens at the end of the loop?
^ times so far. Ten minutes each.
^I see. What happens at the end of the loop?
^I've... kind of lost count. It's been a lot.
^Oh no. Have you talked to anyone about this yet?
^Well, yeah... but nobody really believes me.
^Oh no! Why didn't you come to me sooner? You can always count on me, you know.
^Ah, it's okay. I'm here for you now.
^If you don't mind me asking, what happens at the end of the loop?

c-2: ^Yep. We talked about how it ends. It stayed the same.
^For the most part, no. But I found an ice pick while I was on the mainland, and I was able to bring it back with me.
^Hmm. Is there a version of it still on the mainland?
^Next time you get a chance, look for it and let me know.
^By the way, Isa... thanks for believing me. It... helps.
c-3: ^Yep. We talked about how it ends, and what changes between loops.
^Okay. And you don't know why it's happening?
^I remember a strange... dream, almost. From before the first loop.
^I was watching someone - a Witness, I think, but they...
^Pretty much all of our axioms, yeah. So unless one of us has gone rogue, it must have just been a weird dream.
^... well, I didn't really want to get into it, but...
^^CYCallisto^CX went missing on a trip to Corendia, right?
^I'm sorry! This is why I didn't want to talk about it.
^It's just, I just thought, I wanted to help...
^No. This is just a stupid dream. ^CYMy mother^CX has nothing to do with this.
^And... you don't get to just... accuse her of something like that, when she isn't even...
^Arcas, I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I... we all miss her, you know?

lyr_loop_end: ^I start... burning up. It feels like I'm dying.
^And then... I start to fall apart.
^I pass through this strange, dark space, and then I end up right back home.
^Hmm. Are you always in Arktis when it happens, or have you made it outside?
^Actually, it's only ever happened once I've left for the mainland.
^Interesting. You mentioned a burning sensation... perhaps the cold here keeps it in check?
^Well, keep working through the loop. Talk to me if anything strange happens.
^Oh! and - so you don't have to explain all this again, next time, say "pigeon".
